name: Doença do Diabo
description:
Doença do Diabo is an arcade runner made by "Wombo Pombo", a group of students from the 3rd term in Game Design at UAM (Universidade Anhembi Morumbi - São Paulo, Brazil).

Travel through the cursed roads taking a holy bell to the church, while the devil and the slumber try to get you.

Dodge the many obstacles and catch the music notes, so you can endure the will to sleep, and escape the devil.

That game was inspired by River Raid and the brazilian story of the "Carro caído" (that can be found on the book "Lendas brasileiras" from "Câmara Cascudo").

Made with Processing.
